item.title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
item.description: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

item.title: First arrest after high-value museum raid
item.description: Detectives are still hunting for four other suspects and have released new CCTV images.

item.title: China to relax travel rules for British visitors, UK says
item.description: It comes as Sir Keir Starmer visits Beijing - the first UK prime minister to do so in eight years.

item.title: Ministers reject Waspi calls for compensation after rethink
item.description: Women hit by changes to the state pension age say the decision shows "utter contempt" for their situation.

item.title: Great Ormond Street doctor who botched surgery harmed nearly 100 children
item.description: Yaser Jabbar specialised in limb-lengthening and reconstruction for children with complex problems.
